website_summaries.verdict: A flavorful gluten-free bread that doesn't compromise on ingredients or bread integrity.
pros: This bread works well toasted or untoasted
Taste and texture are similar to traditional wheat bread
Bread doesn't require freezing or refrigeration to stay fresh
Should you wish to freeze the bread, thawing does not affect the bread's integrity
Bread contains no eggs or dairy
cons: Ships in packages of 6, which can be expensive

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent loaves
customer_reviews.text: Usually this bread is reliable but once in a while you get a loaf with air bubbles in the middle as a result of baking. That makes the slices bad for sandwiches which is mainly how I use the bread. See for yourself in the photo.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: I usually LOVE this bread and have placed several orders in the ...
customer_reviews.text: I usually LOVE this bread and have placed several orders in the past, but the last order I received NONE of the loaves were OK. 2 had been vacuum sealed by squishing the bread into a BRICK!!! It was not usuable. and 2 of them had the vacuum seal broken so that they were squashed when they were plastic wrapped for shipping. At the price of each loaf of bread, I was out ALL of my money as they all had to be thrown away. Could have used them for breadcrumbs, but that's pretty pricey! Have just attempted to reorder and if they do not arrive OK (sloppy preparation for shipping), I will be cancelling my subscription.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia R. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Deliciously Perfect! (BUT SEE SAD UPDATE!!!😞)
customer_reviews.text: Things I like: it's gluten free.☺💗 It is wrapped very well...no squashing, no holes, no out of dates, very fresh, and delicious. Fortunately my double order (two packs of two each), had NONE of the negative issues so many others had, so perhaps the issues are resolved well. The price is terrific. To two interesting concerns I don't understand: why WOULDN'T all gluten free breads be frozen anyway? To me, it's mandatory as a matter of course. And I always toast my gf bread, too, whether I'm eating it as a meal supplement or sandwiching. 😇🌷🗽🎵 Update: Feb.25, 2019 HOW DISAPPOINTING!!!😞 The price for these has almost doubled to an unreasonable price. Now I can't afford them at all!!!😞😞😞😞😞
customer_reviews.author: Gem

customer_reviews.title: Best GF bread out there
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this is a great bread if you’re gluten free, and have allergies to milk and egg. This is probably one of the most ‘realistic’ breads we have found. There are a couple of drawbacks. It’s expensive (not just on amazon). Sometimes we’ll find large holes in the loaves making many slices unusable. Sometimes, they will vacuum seal the bags so much it smooshes the loaves and that makes the whole loaf basically unusable. That’s probably the most frustrating as the slices become this 2x2 inch dense piece of gross. This is still my go to option for GF bread, though.
customer_reviews.author: Elyse S.

customer_reviews.title: Nearly expired. Will have to freeze.
customer_reviews.text: The two loaves I receive expire on 8/26. Received on 8/22. Will have to freeze one loaf for sure and then toast it. Which defeats the whole purpose of buying Schär bread. Not happy. I live too far away from a post office to make returning it worth my while.
customer_reviews.author: CE

customer_reviews.title: Great taste and texture
customer_reviews.text: Finally I found a gluten free bread that doesn't have a disgusting, crumbly, dry texture that just sits in your mouth for a while. This bread tastes good and actually holds its shape! The texture is soft and smooth. I've gotten so many gluten free breads that just break into bits as soon as I pick it up and I hate it. Definitely recommend this bread to anyone who's trying to cut gluten out!
customer_reviews.author: TrippNessa

customer_reviews.title: Expired!
customer_reviews.text: Although the bread is very good, the two loaves were past the expiration date when they arrived :-(
customer_reviews.author: Chasfroggie

customer_reviews.title: Yes yes yes!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is quite possibly the best bread I’ve ever had. Not even considering that it’s GF! It’s perfect for grilled cheese sandwiches. Perfect for every possible use. My only complaint is that the two loaves come tightly wrapped in syran wrap which compresses them slightly.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan L.

customer_reviews.title: Good bread for IBS sufferers
customer_reviews.text: This bread is very good for IBS sufferers like me. The expiration date is over a month away on both loaves so no problems there. The bread has a very nice taste and texture almost like cake. I like this bread and recommend it for those suffering from IBS.
customer_reviews.author: handyman

customer_reviews.title: Shipping expired products
customer_reviews.text: Love this bread but I was shipped 4 expired loaves. Dated 9-6-18. Normally these are dated well beyond the expired date, frustrated to have these shipped with this bread being so expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My Teenager Loves It
customer_reviews.text: Both my teen and I really enjoy how fresh and light the bread tastes. We like being gluten free but aren't too strict about it. Still, finding items that taste as great as products made with wheat is where we're at now. And, this bread meets the criteria. I don't love how pricey it is but I don't know enough about the process of making/packaging/etc. to comment further. It has a long shelf-life if unopened, which is great.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Cerasoli

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: This bread has a neutral taste, which is good because many gf breads can have a distinctive off taste that is hard to describe. The loaf is about 31⁄2 inches high and the slices are approximately 1⁄2 inch thick. It's a firm bread that doesn't crumble. It's okay for French toast and can be dried in the oven on low heat for stuffing or croutons. The cost is about $6.00 a loaf. You always pay more for gluten-free, although the cost of wheat products is higher than it used to be.
customer_reviews.author: Lorac

customer_reviews.title: Price is high.  Changes were not for the best.
customer_reviews.text: Delicious, but too expensive. The last two loaves said "new improved". Not the case. Flavor was nowhere as good as previous loaves and the crust was not good. Bread was not as moist as any of the Schar GF white bread from earlier orders.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: A great Gluten-free bread
customer_reviews.text: I have celiac disease so no bread for me. I’ve spent many years trying out different brands and really like The Schär brand of bread products. It doesn’t fall apart and has a good taste and consistency! A rare find. I have found that it’s best if you separate the bread into serving portions and freeze it. Thaw when needed by warming in the microwave. The bread comes out soft and chewy.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa B

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised by the freshness date!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product with a bit of trepidation because I read the reviews. So when I opened it, I was expecting the brick-like feel, because it’s wrapped to keep it fresh. But the big thing I looked for was the freshness date. So many people complained about the freshness date. And mine came in with a freshness date of 9-12-19. Today is June 15, 2019. I was SOOO happy you would’ve thought I won a lottery! I’m looking forward to the taste, texture and quality, but those are backseat items for me.
customer_reviews.author: geegeethree

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY LOVE Schar products BUT
customer_reviews.text: ...why is it that when I get food items with subscribe&save the expiration date is so close? Had a delivery of this bread on February 13th and expiration date is March 19th. Schar deserves 5 stars, they make the best tasting gluten free products. Subscribe&save I will try to avoid from now on for food items.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Great for an emergency, but not everyday use.
customer_reviews.text: My son, who shops for me, has not found been finding gluten-free bread. The stores have been out! It happens, so I ordered Schar Artisan bread. Have had this before. Tastes is very good, bread holds up under sandwich toppings and you won’t over eat. My one sad face is the size, this would be great for toddler sandwich size. But isn’t enough for an adult, unless you have lots of side items to fill out your lunch.
customer_reviews.author: DBarnmyer

customer_reviews.title: Slice is nice, buns not so much
customer_reviews.text: Loved the artisanal white gluten free sourdough sandwich slices, unfortunately the buns were tiny width, overly thick, and could be used to de-humidifiy your house.
customer_reviews.author: Tater-tot

customer_reviews.title: Good quality gluten free bread with ice taste
customer_reviews.text: The bread itself is very nice ad tasty, but Amazon price is too high. I ordered from Thrive market for $4.99 each. So if I need miore in the future I will go there. The difference in price is too great.
customer_reviews.author: T. Stone

customer_reviews.title: Very Best of the commercial GF Breads
customer_reviews.text: This is the best of the gluten free breads. Great texture and tastes like “real” bread. It’s expensive on Amazon now, but I can’t find ANY gf bread in stores now, and social distancing requirements keep me from traveling all over the county to try finding a loaf.
customer_reviews.author: BookFanatic

customer_reviews.title: Good without Gluten Bread
customer_reviews.text: I think the flavor is good and I am on a special gluten free diet (which is not easy) and I love bread, I never thought I could replace my regular bread with gluten with one I would like but its good! It is very small in diameter per slice but it was wrapped well and well sealed, Definitely a great surprise!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Coopman

customer_reviews.title: This is the best Gluten Free Bread
customer_reviews.text: The texture of this bread is perfect for sandwiches. It doesn't need to be frozen. It has a sour dough flavor. I am so thankful for it for my teenager who has a newer diagnosis of Celiac. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: J. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Bread
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy this locally for a higher price. As long as it stays at a lower price I will continue to buy it here instead. Great flavor and texture compared to other brands.
customer_reviews.author: PJPenaMuma

customer_reviews.title: Freshness
customer_reviews.text: We don't normally purchase bread online but with the corona virus we gave it a try and were pleasantly surprised by the timeliness and freshness of a product that we normally purchase in grocery stores.
customer_reviews.author: A movie fan, WA USA

customer_reviews.title: Schar Gluten Free the best I have found in the last 5 years
customer_reviews.text: As have written previously about Multigrain and Multigrain Nuts and Seed by Schar. Great gluten free bread. Toasted or plain. I find Schar less expensive at grocery but have purchased all 3 types on AMAZON where it is more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: M.J.Walker

customer_reviews.title: Very old product that tastes disgusting, like CHALK!
customer_reviews.text: Product is OLD, I only tried a tiny piece, the result I found was very disappointed, old product and tasted disgusting like Chalk! I will never order from this seller and the same product!!
customer_reviews.author: MP from NY

customer_reviews.title: By far the best gluten free bread out there.
customer_reviews.text: Even my friends that aren't gluten free love this bread.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Was not delivered to designated drop box
customer_reviews.text: This bread is ok for a gluten free bread. The order was not delivered to the location designated for deliveries. Driver did not follow instructions. Thank you. LADYD
customer_reviews.author: AmaLADYDzon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good GF bread
customer_reviews.text: I went Gluten Free a few years ago and was missing bread. I tried different and finally discovered Schar's. It has the best taste and texture of any of the others . It is expensive but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Digirolamo

customer_reviews.title: Avoid
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely horrible. Give me real bread over this junk everytime!!! This is dry,tastless and thick... eating this is like trung to est a loofa
customer_reviews.author: Npolefox

customer_reviews.title: Gluten free staple
customer_reviews.text: We love Schars gluten-free products. They're all good and a solid alternative if you want to avoid gluten. We've never had any issue with it and we're celiac.
customer_reviews.author: nora ryan

customer_reviews.title: Good bread
customer_reviews.text: Really good bread but it’s pricey. Ships from baker in a box so gets to house safely. If food comes from Amazon I it has arrived in pieces or smashed liked it was ran over. I will order this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Richerlyn

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: I eat gluten free and rarely eat bread, but sometimes I want some. This one is the best tasting that I have tried. I keep it in my freezer and take slices out as I need them.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Landrigan

customer_reviews.title: Yummy. Expensive. Two things remove and replace: ...
customer_reviews.text: Yummy. Expensive. Two things remove and replace: Canola oil and Honey. Instead use Hemp oil and Cane sugar or remove all together
customer_reviews.author: J Hill

customer_reviews.title: EXPIRED Food Product
customer_reviews.text: I received this in a box with kitty litter- gross! The replacement bread came on 3/23/2019 which would be fine except that the bread had a fresh by date of 3/19/2019. This is not the first time I received food items with near or expired sell by or freshness dates. I try to use Amazon Prime Pantry for my Gluten Free items so I can be sure to have them. It defeats the purpose if its not fresh?
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Ciccarella

customer_reviews.title: Expensive & Poor Tasting
customer_reviews.text: This has a terrible order. It is not very tasty. The loaf's are small and there is not any bang for the buck - IMO.
customer_reviews.author: Feng tai da

customer_reviews.title: Best Bread! My Gluten Free Toddler and I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This bread does taste yummy! I am happy that my toddler can eat this bread. We are in the boonies in AK and our gluten free options are very limited. This bread was fresh and delicious!!!! Thank you. I will be ordering often!!!
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Love this brand
customer_reviews.text: Love this bread The best gluten free bread The only bad thing it is I find it expensive. I used to but it for less many in the supermarket but I moved and this is the only way to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: VA

customer_reviews.title: Great, fresh, vacuum packed bread!
customer_reviews.text: This bread is vacuum packed so it arrived fresh. It tastes like "regular" bread, not dry like gf bread can be. I highly recommend it for sandwiches, toast and... anything.
customer_reviews.author: BONNIE MAXEY

customer_reviews.title: Moron packers
customer_reviews.text: I love this bread but who ever packed at Amazon was a total moron. It arrived completely smashed flat. Total waste of my money and time. Useless!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Gallo

customer_reviews.title: Nice bread, even by my gluten consuming family standards
customer_reviews.text: The bread is soft, yet doesn't fall apart as easily as some other breads. We keep it in the fridge and it doesn't seem to grow mold for quite awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne K

customer_reviews.title: Fine
customer_reviews.text: As far as gluten free, egg free dairy free bread its great. If you dont have food sensitivities not great.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer40534

customer_reviews.title: Good taste, very expensive
customer_reviews.text: This bread tastes better than many of the gluten free breads i’ve Tried. But it’s very expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Granny Beth

customer_reviews.title: Bland taste
customer_reviews.text: Sent this to my son in Arizona. He was not pleased with the bland taste. Said it was ok once he put something on it.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant surprise
customer_reviews.text: Didnt have high expectations after reading some reviews but I was desperate. Im actually amazed at the quality. Expiration date is in a few months from my request day ( 2 days ago).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No crumbly mess
customer_reviews.text: An excellent product that holds together well. Even when you are eating a lumpy sandwich the bread holds together pretty well and the flavor is good.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley D. Oliver

customer_reviews.title: One of the better gluten free breads Ive tried.
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for GF! Flavor is good and one of the better gf breads that I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry804

customer_reviews.title: mine came with good dates. found bread to be tasteless
customer_reviews.text: unlike other reviews, mine came with good dates. found bread to be tasteless, and the slices are very, very, very, very small. almost useless
customer_reviews.author: Daniel O.

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: Gross. Bread is tasteless, slices are small and it causes gastrointestinal upset! What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Mermaidbones

customer_reviews.title: Fresh good bread
customer_reviews.text: Good and delicious bread for those who want non gluten. thanks 1
customer_reviews.author: Wanda C. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great value, best gluten free bread that I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good, arrived smashed
customer_reviews.text: The bread had a good taste and texture but was squished into a star shape which could not have been the result of shipping.
customer_reviews.author: P Trip

customer_reviews.title: Thankful to find GF bread but cost too much
customer_reviews.text: I'm GF and was happy to find this, the bread arrived in good condition and was fresh. Just not sure if i'd buy again due to the price.
customer_reviews.author: AnaisLM

customer_reviews.title: Tasty
customer_reviews.text: Great. Keep in freezer. Take out when my gf family comes over.
customer_reviews.author: SUSAN MIKAN

customer_reviews.title: Rather expensive white loaves of gluten free tasteless bread!
customer_reviews.text: Expensive white gluten free loaves of bread that aren’t very good unless you toast them but in all fairness I haven’t done much comparison shopping!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Collins

customer_reviews.title: Fresh bread, great service
customer_reviews.text: Great service, came in quicker than I expected. The bread was fresh and always taste good.
customer_reviews.author: Kathie Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great gluten-free bread!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best gluten-free bread we’ve found. The taste is great! Not too soft, not hard like a rustic bread. My young daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Jorgenson

customer_reviews.title: Available internationally
customer_reviews.text: Not the best gluten free bread, but edible for sure
customer_reviews.author: Marina T

customer_reviews.title: I get two of these a month, love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this bread and the Schar company. Sometimes it comes a little small but that's probably smushing from the hardcore wrap job they do to preserve it. Would like it more if the price was better.
customer_reviews.author: F.W.

customer_reviews.title: This is by far the best gluten-free bread I found
customer_reviews.text: Product as expected! This is by far the best gluten-free bread I found. We have to have egg free for my daughter and this one is perfect. We are PN, TN, peas, beans, lentils and eggs!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: BEST BREAD EVER
customer_reviews.text: This gluten free bread tastes better than fresh-baked regular bread. My sister and I eat it up as soon as it is delivered. and it's so fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne51

customer_reviews.title: So great TOASTED!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best bread by far if your gluten-free!!
customer_reviews.author: JoJo

customer_reviews.title: great for gluten intolerant people
customer_reviews.text: buy this product and from this seller. Thank you for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Qui pro domina justitia sequitur

customer_reviews.title: It is quite good and uses no Tapioca
customer_reviews.text: Schar is the only Gluten, dairy free bread that I have found that can be eaten without toasting. It is quite good and uses no Tapioca.
customer_reviews.author: Pam C

customer_reviews.title: Good GF bread
customer_reviews.text: Gluten free bread that does not need to be chilled. Yeah
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Delicious GF bread
customer_reviews.text: I love this bread! The white bread and the ancient grain are by far the best Gluten free breads I have found. As with most gluten free bread I do think it tasted best toasted or grilled,in fact this makes delicious grilled cheese as well as awesome garlic bread in oven. Came shipped with plastic wrap around each loaf for extra freshness.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Hall

customer_reviews.title: Best Tasting Gluten Free Bread
customer_reviews.text: Have tried a number of gluten free breads. This is the best tasting yet.
customer_reviews.author: MamaNole

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: By far, the best white GF bread. Soft and slightly sweet but still tastes great with deli meat. Holds well in storage. Doesn't fall apart like other GF breads. Just bought another one.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best for sandwiches
customer_reviews.text: Best bread I’ve found since I’ve had to go gluten free great for sandwiches
customer_reviews.author: joseph odom

customer_reviews.title: Out of date for freshness
customer_reviews.text: Outside white plastic said 05/02/18. Inside stamped May 02/18/2011 threw in garbage
customer_reviews.author: L. Amling

customer_reviews.title: Great bread
customer_reviews.text: The bread was fresh and delicious. The bread was hearty and very filling.
customer_reviews.author: Daphnis

customer_reviews.title: The only gluten-free bread that actually tastes good!
customer_reviews.text: This bread actually tastes good. And I don't know what they do to make it stay fresh so long, but it's great that you can order in quantities and it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: BDP

customer_reviews.title: Gluten free
customer_reviews.text: Although it’s expensive, it’s still the best gluten free product I’ve found
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Reiter

customer_reviews.title: Worth a try!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best tasting gluten free breads that I've found. Also, many gluten free breads don't hold up to sandwich ingredients, but this brand does the job well.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony G.

customer_reviews.title: Gluten Free
customer_reviews.text: This bread is tasty and has good texture as well. Better than others I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: threelabs

customer_reviews.title: Gluten free and tasty
customer_reviews.text: Gluten free and tasty. The best gluten free bread I’ve found so far.
customer_reviews.author: SIVA ONES

customer_reviews.title: Wath
customer_reviews.text: says 9 units only two bags arrive, I do not understand
customer_reviews.author: Lis

customer_reviews.title: Wasted money
customer_reviews.text: I did not like the taste nor the texture of it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small but good
customer_reviews.text: Smaller loaf size for the $ but packaged well to stay fresh
customer_reviews.author: Gary Turner

customer_reviews.title: My daughter and I loved this alternative
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I loved this alternative, I didn't enjoy however that it was a bit less springy than regular breads (quick to break in half when I would cookie cut my daughters PB&J sandwiches) also, I taste a bit of a yeasty flavor (don't know if it is just me)
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Casul

customer_reviews.title: Taste!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a gluten dairy free, wheat free bread that didn’t tast like cardboard for a long long time! This bread was soft n tasty!! Thank u!!! I can eat bread again!😍
customer_reviews.author: Storm

customer_reviews.title: GF bread , yayyyyyyyyy
customer_reviews.text: The best GF bread we found so far. Better yet to be here on subscribe and save .
customer_reviews.author: Sue Ol.

customer_reviews.title: I liked it.
customer_reviews.text: Different taste and texture than regular bed. I liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: The slices are dense and thick. Makes for a very bready/cakey sandwich
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Important you know that not all packages are delivered properly.
customer_reviews.text: I used it to eat...I have recommended this product to others with gluten issues. I have used it before, and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Norman

customer_reviews.title: Soft but small slices
customer_reviews.text: This bread is soft and tasty but the slices are very small.
customer_reviews.author: Thea S

customer_reviews.title: What happened
customer_reviews.text: Finally recieved it. Hopefully it tastes great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: 2 different tastes
customer_reviews.text: The first time order was delicious than the second one..the second order has a different taste.. i ordered again thinking both orders have the same taste..
customer_reviews.author: Lorna

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great!
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter has celiac. We do not. The flavor is better than gluten products.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Wageman

customer_reviews.title: Best Gluten Free Bread
customer_reviews.text: Best gluten free bread company. I subscribed to receive two loafs a month and it’s working out great.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Pullen

customer_reviews.title: my new schar favorite but way too expensive
customer_reviews.text: have been enjoying this new bread from schar and just ordered another package of two. the new bread has a great taste, texture and i love it toasted. my only complaint the price went from $16.98 to $27.98 really???? come on guys is it necessary to fleece us just because we are gluten sensitive? seems excessive to me. i GIVE the PRODUCT 5 STARS and the SELLER 0 STAR for this reason.
customer_reviews.author: w109

customer_reviews.title: Raise in price during Pandemic!
customer_reviews.text: I used to love this bread, but Schar is taking advantage of consumers and raising their prices during the Pandemic.
customer_reviews.author: AW

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Love the bread got a great deal,fast delivery, ordered and package went right out and received my bread in 5 day!
customer_reviews.author: Marquise Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Texture is crumbly.  Not good.
customer_reviews.text: This bread tasted awful. I will not buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Donna C. Blackwell

customer_reviews.title: It’s good and fresh!
customer_reviews.text: Took a while to find and lots of trying breads that tasted horrible. This is the best and freshest gluten, egg, dairy, nut free bread I have found by far.
customer_reviews.author: Chuckbob

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Didn't good well for my tummy.but most Schar things I love
customer_reviews.author: bg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The product is delicious and the right size in every slice.......
customer_reviews.author: cora

customer_reviews.title: This is fantastic!!
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic!!! I can have plain regular sandwiches again. Cheese toast, etc!!! I really do love this bread and highly recommend for those who have digestive issues!!! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle A Sinclair

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: I have hashimoto’s disease and cannot eat gluten the bread testes very good
customer_reviews.author: Héctor Delgado

customer_reviews.title: wrap
customer_reviews.text: I dont like the plastic wrap around the bread. It is very tight and hard to open
customer_reviews.author: christine

product_meta.title: Schar Gluten Free Artisan Baker White Bread, 2 Count
product_meta.description: Schär introduces another gluten-free wonder with the artisan baker. This new line with amazing taste and texture will replace the original classic white and multigrain breads. Crafted with a European recipe and baked with sourdough, millet, quinoa and honey, we believe it is the best tasting gluten-free bread. This bread is gluten free, wheat free, egg free and lactose free. Ideal for toasts, sandwiches, and snacks. Includes two 14.1 oz loaves of bread. Made with non-gmo ingredients. Ingredients include: water, rice starch, sourdough (water, rice, flour), corn starch, agave syrup, sunflower oil, soy protein, modified cellulose, phylum seed husks (vegetable fiber), guar gum, millet flour, yeast, sugar, quinoa flour, salt, citrus fiber, honey, calcium citrate, niacin, iron, thiamine, riboflavin. Storage Instructions: Keep Frozen. For best results, toast before serving.
feature_bullets: Ideal for toasts, sandwiches, and snacks
Gluten free, wheat free, lactose free, egg free
